action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

Your goal for this game is to brew a potion following the potion recipe.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a bedroom now. There are a book, a potion recipe, a wardrobe, a bed and a pillow. The book is on the bed. The potion recipe is on the bed. The wardrobe is closed. The pillow is on the floor. There is a passage to a reading room here.
action.label: context

action.content: > take book and potion recipe
action.label: response
